main.tool

Class DrawEvent

  • java.lang.Object
    • main.tool.DrawEvent

  • public class DrawEvent
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is to store information relevent to drawing to the screen

      • DrawEvent

        public DrawEvent(java.awt.event.MouseEvent e,
                 java.awt.Graphics2D g,
                 java.awt.Graphics2D tempG,
                 float zoom,
                 GUIManager manager)
        Parameters:
        e - The MouseEvent used to determine mouse info for drawing
        g - The main graphics object which draws to the image
        tempG - The temporary graphics object to draw directly to the canvas
        zoom - The zoom ratio of the image
        manager - The graphics manager

      • DrawEvent

                 int y,
                 GUIManager manager)
        Parameters:
        e1 - The MouseEvent used to determine mouse info for drawing
        g - The main graphics object which draws to the image
        tempG - The temporary graphics object to draw directly to the canvas
        zoom - The zoom ratio of the image
        x - The initial x coordinates
        y - The initial y coordinates
        manager - The graphics manager
